author: ainecora
text: I have read up on the Sinclair method and read reviews and it does seem to work.I don't know why I'm afraid to let him drink, he wanted drink last night we were at a bday party I didn't agree or disagree but he didn't get any. I think I'm afraid he won't take the tablets and drink. But I think I will have to talk with him and try the Sinclair method. He would take the tablet 1/2 hours before he would normally drink which is late evening, he also smokes weed. So this tablet will not work (as good) or at all, u are better to drink on them only when u feel the need, he would normally drink every 2nd day
